wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Here is my version of your code from Jan 2008:
let (|TK|_|) token input = let rec ParseToken token input = match token,(|NC|_|) input with | t :: [], Some(i, input1) when i = t -> Some(input1) | t :: token1, Some(i, input1) when i = t-> ParseToken token1 input1 | _ -> None ParseToken (List.of_seq token) input
